summary: Iteration 9 testing complete - All new features verified and a bug fixed. DELETE /api/activities endpoint and UI deletion works. App name 'Compass X Grow' displayed correctly. Client cards show Buyer, Opportunity totals, and Google Drive link. Notes running tally on client detail page works with add note functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: DELETE /api/activities/{activity_id} works - creates and deletes activity
Backend: GET /api/organizations/{org_id}/summary returns buyer and opportunity totals
Backend: POST /api/organizations/{org_id}/notes adds note to history
Backend: Empty note submission correctly rejected with 400 error
Backend: GET /api/activities returns list of all activities
Backend: GET /api/activities?org_id={id} filters activities by organization
Frontend: App name 'Compass X Grow' shown on login page
Frontend: App name 'Compass X Grow' shown in sidebar
Frontend: Client cards show 'Buyer' section (with buyer name/role or 'No buyer identified')
Frontend: Client cards show opportunity totals (Deals count, Value, Conf %)
Frontend: Client cards show Google Drive button when link is set
Frontend: Client detail page shows prominent Google Drive link card-style
Frontend: Client detail page has Notes section with input and add button
Frontend: Notes appear as running tally with author and timestamp
Frontend: Delete activity button works on Activities page
Frontend: Delete activity button works on Client Detail page

bugs_fixed.issue: GET /api/organizations/{org_id}/summary endpoint was looking for wrong field names 'value' and 'confidence' instead of 'estimated_value' and 'confidence_level'
bugs_fixed.fix: Updated field names in MongoDB query and calculation

seed_data_creation: Test activities and notes created during testing with 'TEST_' prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 9 features verified working: 1) Delete activity works on both Activities page and Client Detail page (toast shows 'Activity deleted'). 2) App name 'Compass X Grow' shows on login page and sidebar. 3) Client cards show Buyer section, Opportunity totals (Deals/Value/Conf), and Google Drive link when present. 4) Client detail page has Notes running tally section with add note input. 5) Fixed bug where organization summary showed $0 and 0% due to wrong field names (value/confidence vs estimated_value/confidence_level).

verified_features.delete_activity_api: Working - DELETE /api/activities/{id} returns 200 and removes activity
verified_features.delete_activity_activities_page: Working - Delete button removes activity and shows 'Activity deleted' toast
verified_features.delete_activity_client_detail: Working - Delete button removes activity from client's activity list
verified_features.app_name_login_page: Working - 'Compass X Grow' shown in header and hero section
verified_features.app_name_sidebar: Working - 'Compass X Grow' shown next to logo
verified_features.client_cards_buyer_section: Working - Shows buyer name/role or 'No buyer identified'
verified_features.client_cards_opp_totals: Working - Shows Deals count, Value (e.g., $540K), Conf % (e.g., 96.7%)
verified_features.client_cards_google_drive: Working - Blue 'Google Drive' button with external link icon
verified_features.client_detail_google_drive: Working - Prominent card-style link with 'Open client folder' text
verified_features.client_detail_notes_input: Working - Input field with placeholder 'Add a note...'
verified_features.client_detail_add_note_button: Working - Send button adds note to running tally
verified_features.client_detail_notes_tally: Working - Notes displayed with author name and timestamp
verified_features.organization_summary_api: Working - Returns buyer and opportunity totals (after fix)
